Welcome to Geostat! This application was created to help you report your presence or absence within your organization.


Instructions:

Please sign in or register with Google or Facebook.


Press the "mark my presence" button.


A new screen will appear. It allows you to determine your location in relation to your organization's premises:


*If you are outside the perimeter of your structure , you will be redirected to a page to send an absence form.


*If you are inside the perimeter of your structure, you will click on the "I am present" button.


Note: Reporting of presence can only be done from 10:00 a.m. to 10:59 a.m. and from 3:00 p.m. to 3:59 p.m.


*If no presence or absence report is made during the day, then starting from 8:00 p.m., the application will attempt to send an absence form to the database.


Furthermore, you have the option to click on the "My presence statistics" button to view your absence proportions and their reasons, as well as your presence.


Press the "DETAILS" button and you can view the exact days of presence and absence.
